body:
## Expected Behavior

I want to build the package from the source cod
## Actual Behavior

```
[root@rgQoNn1000693 temporal]# make
fatal: Not a git repository (or any of the parent directories): .git
fatal: Not a git repository (or any of the parent directories): .git
Install/update check tools...
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports
go install golang.org/x/lint/golint
go install honnef.co/go/tools/cmd/staticcheck
go install github.com/kisielk/errcheck
go install github.com/googleapis/api-linter/cmd/api-linter
go install github.com/bufbuild/buf/cmd/buf
Install/update mockgen tool...
go install github.com/golang/mock/mockgen
Install/update proto plugins...
go install github.com/temporalio/gogo-protobuf/protoc-gen-gogoslick
go install google.golang.org/grpc
Delete old binaries...
Build temporal-server with OS: linux, ARCH: amd64...
go build -ldflags '-X go.temporal.io/server/common/metrics.GitRevision= -X go.temporal.io/server/common/metrics.GitBranch= -X go.temporal.io/server/common/metrics.GitVersion=unknown -X go.temporal.io/server/common/metrics.BuildDate=2021-02-19-16:39:05 -X go.temporal.io/server/common/metrics.BuildTimeUnix=1613723945' -o temporal-server cmd/server/main.go
package command-line-arguments
        imports go.temporal.io/server/common/authorization
        imports go.temporal.io/server/common/service/config
        imports go.temporal.io/server/common/messaging
        imports github.com/temporalio/kafka-client
        vendor/github.com/temporalio/kafka-client/consumerBuilder.go:28:2: use of internal package github.com/uber-go/kafka-client/internal/consumer not allowed
make: *** [temporal-server] Error 
```
## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. download temporal v1.5.1
  1.make

## Specifications

  - Version: go version go1.15.6 linux/amd64
  - Platform:CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)

comments.body: the latest version is 1.7, if you are doing evaluation, try to use the latest version

are you already running a live cluster? 
if so upgrade to 1.6.4, then 1.7.0
first update the schema (if there is any schema change) then deploy the binary

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

title: temporal 1.5.1 build failed
